Class StaffDmView.StaffChatDetailWindow

java.lang.Object
application.StaffDmView.StaffChatDetailWindow
Enclosing class:
StaffDmView
private static class StaffDmView.StaffChatDetailWindow extends Object
Inner class for displaying a chat detail window for staff monitoring.

This class provides a read-only view of chat conversations for staff members. It is similar to ChatDetailWindow but designed for monitoring purposes.

  • Constructor Details

    • StaffChatDetailWindow

      public StaffChatDetailWindow(int chatId, int staffUserId, String staffUserName, String user1Name, String user2Name, DatabaseHelperDM dmHelper)
      Constructor for the StaffChatDetailWindow.

      Initializes the window with the chat information.

      Parameters:
      chatId - The unique identifier of the chat conversation to display
      staffUserId - The unique identifier of the current staff user
      staffUserName - The display name of the current staff user
      user1Name - The display name of the first participant
      user2Name - The display name of the second participant
      dmHelper - The database helper for direct messaging operations

  • Method Details

    • show

      public void show()
      Shows the staff chat detail window.

      Creates and displays the dialog window with all UI components including the header, message area, and footer with staff monitoring indicators. Loads existing messages and automatically scrolls to the most recent message.

    • createHeader

      private javafx.scene.layout.HBox createHeader()
      Creates the header area with conversation information.

      The header displays the names of both participants in the conversation and a staff monitoring indicator.

      Returns:
      An HBox containing the header components

    • createMessageArea

      private javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane createMessageArea()
      Creates the scrollable message area.

      This area displays all messages in the conversation and allows scrolling through message history.

      Returns:
      A ScrollPane containing the message container

    • createFooter

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox createFooter()
      Creates the footer area with staff monitoring information.

      The footer displays information about the monitoring session and provides a close button.

      Returns:
      A VBox containing the footer components

    • loadMessages

      private void loadMessages()
      Loads and displays messages for the current chat.

      Retrieves messages from the database and creates UI elements to display them. Messages are displayed with clear indication of which user sent them.
